name: Lost Lives
description:
Lost Lives

Lost Lives is the 2D Multiplayer shooter that is still in development. 

Features:

Main game mode - deathmatch (up to 7 players in one match)

6 weapon units:

  • AK-74
  • VSS "Vintorez"
  • MP-133
  • SKS
  • Beretta M9
  • Knife

Dynamic day/night cycle that affects your visibility

Varied customization: you can select your clothes, helmet, mask and backpack

Controls:
  • A, D - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Run
  • Control - Crouch
  • Left mouse button - Shoot or cancel healing/reloading
  • Right mouse button - Aim
  • R - Reload
  • B - Change firemode (single, auto)
  • 1 - Switch to main weapon
  • 3 - Switch to knife
  • F - Heal
  • E - Activate button
  • T - Flashlight
  • N - Nightvision
